title: Troops deployed to CEYPETCO fuel stations
body_lines: Military personnel have been deployed to monitor the distribution of fuel at filling stations operated by the Ceylon Petroleum Corporation, commonly known as CEYPETCO across the country, the Army said.
Military Spokesman Nilantha Premaratna said two military men  will be deployed to each CEYPETCO fuel stations.
He said the army will only monitor the distribution of fuel, not to assist distribution.(Darshana Sanjeewa Balasuriya)
